decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - 1.	The proposed advertisement because of its size, siting, and height above ground level would be intrusive features on this prominent site and would harm the visual amenities of the locality and the character of the Feltham Town Conservation Area contrary to policies ENV.1.2 and ENV.1.7 of the Unitary Development Plan and policies ENV-B.2.2 and ENV-B.1.4 of the UDP Proposed Alterations Revised Deposit.

Condition : 2 - 2.	The proposed advertisement because of its size, siting, and height above ground level would harm the setting of Feltham Station which is a building of Local Townscape Character contrary to policy ENV.1.3c of the Unitary Development Plan and policy ENV-B.2.6 of the UDP Proposed Alterations Revised Deposit.
description: Retention of a single free standing 48 sheet hoarding.
